/config.description: Choose a Share for Airsonic configuration. Eg: create a Share called airsonic-config for this purpose alone.
/config.label: Config Storage

/music.description: Select the Share containing your Media
/music.label: Music Storage

/playlists.description: Choose a Share for Airsonic playlists. Eg: create a Share called airsonic-playlists for this purpose alone.
/playlists.label: Playlist Storage

/podcasts.description: Select the Share to store podcasts
/podcasts.label: Podcast Storage

MAX_MEM.description: This environment variable is used to set the maximum Java heap size in megabytes - 150 is a good default
MAX_MEM.label: MAX_MEM

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID of an existing user with permission to media shares to run Airsonic as (default: 1001).
PUID.label: UID

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID of an existing user with permission to media shares to run Airsonic as (default: 100.
PGID.label: GID

Airsonic Advanced.description:
Airsonic music server.

Based on a custom OCI image: https://hub.docker.com/r/linuxserver/airsonic-advanced, available for x86-64 and arm64 architectures.
